snippet.title: Despelote - Official Gameplay Trailer | Day of the Devs 2021
snippet.description:
As a kid in school in Ecuador, all you want in the world is for school to be over so you can go play soccer. It's 2001, and Ecuador is within reach of qualifying for the World Cup, a feat the team has never accomplished before. Despelote is a semi-autobiographical game about a community based on real experiences and real photos from Ecuador.

#GameTrailers #Gaming #SummerOfGaming
